titles: The lineage of locusts or the Popes pedegre. Beginning with his prime ancestor the Divell, plainely set forth to be noted of all good Christians and true Catholicks, for the avoiding of those subtill snares continually layd for them by his insinuating agents.
notes: Identified as both Wing C5499 and Wing L2330B.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Catholic Church --  Controversial literature --  Early works to 1800.
Anti-Catholicism --  Great Britain --  Early works to 1800.
